org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.kms.server

类 KMSAudit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.key.kms.server.KMSAudit

  • public class KMSAudit
extends Object
    Provides convenience methods for audit logging consistently the different types of events.
